wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.SW.TM.def: Average working hours of children studying and working refer to the average weekly working hours of those children who are attending school in combination with economic activity.
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.SW.TM.name: Average working hours of children, study and work, ages 7-14
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.SW.TM.source: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
wdi2-SL.TLF.0714.SW.TM.dataset: Understanding Children's Work project based on data from ILO, UNICEF and the World Bank.
